snippet: Celebrities, corporate titans and Internet entrepreneurs are buying bigger planes with more extravagant furnishings, including wood-paneled libraries and horse stables.
abstract: Celebrities, corporate titans and Internet entrepreneurs are buying bigger planes with more extravagant furnishings, including wood-paneled libraries and horse stables.

headline.main: A Private Jet With Space for Both the Rolls-Royces
